column20: Evacuate: If there is a potential threat of some property damage
column21: Evacuate: If there is a strong threat of some property damage
column22: Evacuate: If there is a potential threat of some widespread property damage
column23: Evacuate: If there is a strong threat of widespread property damage
column24: Evacuate: If there is a potential threat of widespread injury ("casualty")
column25: Evacuate: If there is a strong threat of widespread injury("casualty")
column26: Evacuate: If there is a potential threat of some death
column27: Evacuate: If there is a strong threat of some death
column28: Evacuate: If there is a potential threat of widespread death
column29: Evacuate: If there is a strong threat of widespread death
